poem:
Title: "In the Theatre of Justice"

Trump, the artful dodger, bound by steel,
In shadows of courtrooms where truth is veiled.
Nine thousand whispers fall in a clime, 
Chiming on the scales of time.
In the stand Mangold's glare unwinds,
About the transcript - such labyrinthine minds.
On the stage of law, the drama unfolds,
A silent echo in hallowed halls still holds.
